title: 114_hr5892
content: This bill amends title II of the Social Security Act to revise the widow's or widower's insurance benefit for any month to equal the greater of: (1) the primary insurance amount of a deceased individual. Or (2) in the case of a fully-insured widow or surviving divorced spouse, 75 of the sum of any old-age or disability insurance benefit to which the widow, widower, or surviving divorced spouse is entitled plus the primary insurance amount of the deceased individual.
